challenges.name: scape_smarts
challenges.rules:
Answer OSRS trivia questions correctly.

Ping _pea if the bot gets one of your answers wrong, lol

information.q: General Graardor is:
Which of the following is not an item you can get from a Mystery Box?
What year did Old School Runescape release on Mobile?
“Newspaper Enthusiast” is a combat achievement for which of the following:
o: Killing Sarachnis with a Crush weapon
None of the above, it's a Slayer Rewards unlock
a: Killing Sarachnis with a Crush weapon

information.q: How many different Team Capes are in the game?
information.p: 50 from Cape Merchants and 3 from Easy Clue Scrolls (Team Capes i, x, and zero)

information.q: Correctly order the rarity of Shade Keys: Black, Red, Purple, Gold, Brown, Crimson
information.a: Red, Brown, Crimson, Black, Purple, Gold

information.q: Which of the following is not a type of Spectre in OSRS?

Which of the following are berries available in Old School Runescape?
Answer with a comma-separated list.
“Extended Encounter” is a combat achievement for:
o: Killing the Phantom Muspah 10 times in one trip
Killing the Royal Titans 15 times without anyone leaving the instance
Killing 30 Moons of Peril bosses without leaving the dungeon
Killing Vorkath 10 times without leaving his area
a: Killing Vorkath 10 times without leaving his area

information.q:
How many total runes do you need to cast the following spells?

Saradomin Strike, Skeletal Grasp, Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond), and Weaken
information.p:
Saradomin Strike is 4 Air, 2 Fire, 2 Blood,
Skeletal Grasp is 8 Earth, 1 Death, 
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond) is 10 Earth, 1 Cosmic, 2 Law, and 
Weaken is 2 Earth, 3 Water, 1 Body

information.q: Which sort of berry is used to create a cure for The Strangler?
Which of the following is not an option for the player's heraldry from Sir Renitee?

As of the most recent stat posting (13 December 2023), which pet is the most common in the game?
The least common?
Which of the following is not an option for a portrait in your POH?

Name three things that can be requested by the Wise Old Man when he assigns you a task.
Answer with a comma-separated list.

Rank these activities from Least to Most Lucrative as reported by the OSRS Wiki's Money Making Guides:
Answer with a comma-separated list.
information.p:
Killing Gargoyles (833,000), 
Pickpocketing Master Farmers (996,000), 
Making Toy Cats (1,220,000), and 
Buying Iron Ore from Ordan (1,257,000)

information.q: Which of the following Kingdom - Leader pairs is incorrect?
information.p:
Varlamore is Queen Zyanyi Arkan. 

If you have finished Making Friends with My Arm, the leader of Weiss is Snowflake

information.q:
Name 3 Gods you would not find in the God Wars Dungeon.
That is, not any of Guthix, Saradomin, Zamorak, Armadyl, Bandos, or Zaros.
Answer with a comma-separated list.

Name 3 Bars, Pubs, or Taverns. 
Answer with a comma-separated list.

What is the max Mage gear setup in F2P?
Answer with a comma-separated list in the order: head, neck, body, legs, weapon

challenges.name: tztik_tztok
challenges.rules: Complete the Fight Caves as quickly as possible using the least possible amount of money on gear and resources. Your score is a weighted average of your time and budget against every other participant. Share a screenshot of your completion time and your inventory/gear setup with the price checker.

challenges.name: alchemy_old_school_magic
challenges.rules:
You have 60 minutes to create as much high alch value as possible. You start in Tree Gnome Stronghold, in the Grand Tree with nothing in your inventory. Submit a screenshot of your final haul.

Banking: Your bank is only accessible to pull out Nature Runes to alch items if you have too many items in your inventory.
POH: Your POH cannot be used for this challenge.

challenges.name: spawn_camping
challenges.rules:
You have 60 minutes to unscramble the list of anagrams and find the item spawns. Begin at the Lumbridge spawn with the Standard Teleports Loadout shared in the events channel. Share a screenshot of your inventory when you finish.

Banking: Access to your bank is prohibited during this challenge.
POH: Your POH cannot be used for this challenge.

challenges.name: prop_hunt
challenges.rules:
Add the "Prop Hunt" plugin to Runelite, pick a chunk (64x64 tile section) of the map, and message _pea. You'll have 5 minutes to hide as a prop in the area. Stay hidden for as long as possible.

Prop Hunt Plugin at https://runelite.net/plugin-hub/show/prop-hunt, and you can find your chunk by adding the Region Locker Plugin from https://runelite.net/plugin-hub/show/region-locker.

challenges.name: alphabet_soup
challenges.rules: You have 20 minutes to kill an NPC for each letter of the alphabet. Submit screenshots from your loot tracker, or from you killing each NPC.

challenges.name: exp_share_the_love
challenges.rules:
Gain experience in every skill as quickly as possible. Reset your EXP Tracker to start, and submit a screenshot of the tracker when you finish.

Banking: Access to your bank is prohibited during this challenge.
POH: Your POH cannot be used for this challenge.

challenges.name: peas_place
challenges.rules: Find each location as quickly as possible. You will be given a zoomed-in screenshot of my character standing somewhere. Every 5 minutes, you will get more of the zoomed-out screenshot. Submit a screenshot of your character standing on the same tile to finish each location. You can skip a stage with !skip, but you'll receive a score of 10 minutes or your time + 5 minutes, whichever is longer at the time of the skip.

challenges.name: shopping_list
challenges.rules: You have 30 minutes to match your inventory to the one given to you. Take a screenshot to show what you were able to find.

challenges.name: chronic_wasting_disease
challenges.rules:
Survive against Corrupted Hunllef for as long as possible. Drop everything in your inventory and enter directly into the fight. No gear, no food, no attacking. Just run and pray.

Your time should be calculated by the bot from the difference in time between your !start and !finish commands. For safety, you might want to submit a screenshot of a timer.

challenges.name: tickets_here
challenges.rules: You have 30 minutes to score as many tickets as possible in the Brimhaven Agility Arena. You'll play with other members of the clan on a PVP world. Binds and Dragon Spear special attacks are legal.

challenges.name: through_hell
challenges.rules: Race against your clan mates through the Underground pass as quickly as possible a on a PVP world. Binds and Dragon Spear special attacks are legal.

challenges.name: final_examine
challenges.rules: Find the NPC or Item described by the given Examine text as quickly as possible. Submit a screenshot of you standing with the target along with your !next command. You can skip a stage with !skip, but you'll receive a time penalty for each skip.

information.2: Phew! Smells awfully like Brimstone... Better keep my mouth closed.
information.4: A burning candle on an interesting stand.
information.5: A tradesman with a mind for the art of battle.
information.6: A siren from the far east.
information.10: The ingredients for the rum go in here.
information.12: Yep, definitely a chicken... an undead chicken.
information.13: Manufacturer of fine leathers, in a dungeon..?
information.14: Serving spices ranging from mild to 'I can't feel my tongue!'
information.15: Looks like he could do with a sip of amontillado.
information.17: He must find gardening difficult since the accident.
information.18: Source of the capybaras' nutritious diet.
information.20: For taking fruit to the market.
information.21: The rarest cat in all of Varlamore.
information.23: I could get a beer from him.

challenges.name: spellbook_swap
challenges.rules: Starting at the Fortis Colosseum, you must race to cast a spell from each of the four spell books. You cannot use your bank, your POH, or any gear or inventory to start. One home teleport spell is allowed.

challenges.name: snakes
challenges.rules:
Using the the "Snake" plugin on Runelite, you have 3 attempts to get the best score possible. Submit a screenshot of each attempt.

https://runelite.net/plugin-hub/show/snake.
Please add the plugin from the link to Runelite for this challenge.
